constraints.name: range_bound
constraints.description: 水面高度 j 必须在 (h_i, H] 之间，且存在 L 和 R 使得 min(h_L, h_R) >= j
constraints.formal: j ∈ (h_i, H] 且 ∃L, R (1 ≤ L < i < R ≤ n 且 min(h_L, h_R) ≥ j)

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 仅考虑下标在 [l, r] 内的所有长方形构成的屋顶

constraints.name: online_query
constraints.description: 部分子任务强制在线，询问参数需要通过异或操作解密
constraints.formal: l = l' ⊕ (t * lastans), r = r' ⊕ (t * lastans), H = H' ⊕ (t * lastans)
